conversation.content: Looking for ideas to reduce food waste in restaurants

Food waste reduction is a crucial sustainability challenge! Are you looking for technology solutions, process improvements, or innovative business models? Also, are you targeting a specific type of restaurant (fast food, fine dining, etc.) or restaurant operations in general?
I'm open to any type of solution - tech, process, or business model. Mainly thinking about casual dining restaurants that throw away a lot of food at the end of each day.

Great scope! End-of-day waste in casual dining is a perfect challenge topic. This sounds ideal for an innovation challenge where participants can propose creative solutions. Should we frame this as seeking specific innovations like apps, partnerships, donation systems, or keep it completely open for any creative approach?

final_spec.title: End-of-Day Food Waste Reduction Challenge for Casual Dining
final_spec.user_goal: Looking for ideas to reduce food waste in restaurants
